sections.description: Headers extracted from the original email.
sections.name: Email Headers

sections.description:
Analysis of SPF, DKIM, DMARC and Microsoft anti-spam headers.

For Microsoft anti-spam headers, please click on each item for the relevant documentation:
[PCL](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/antispam-and-antimalware/antispam-protection/antispam-stamps?view=exchserver-2019) - Phishing Confidence Level.
[BCL](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/bulk-complaint-level-values?view=o365-worldwide) - Bulk Complaint Level.
[SCL](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/security/office-365-security/spam-confidence-levels?view=o365-worldwide) - Spam Confidence Level.
`Note`: The default value is 0, but it can be changed when the "Process Microsoft's Email Headers" playbook runs.
sections.name: Headers Analysis

sections.description: Results of machine-learning checks on the email using a pretrained model.
sections.name: ML Prediction For The Email

sections.description: The category of the email. In case of a phishing email, also shows the phishing sub-type.
sections.name: Email Type Information

sections.description: Provides machine-learning based detection of phishing URLs (shows only malicious detections).
sections.name: ML Prediction for URLs

sections.description: In case a macro code was found in any of the attachments, the source code will appear here.
sections.name: Macro Source Code
